alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 10:41AM CST until February 22 at 2:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 2 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Freezing drizzle tonight, with freezing rain turning to sleet and light snow Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Portions of east central, northeast and southeast Iowa and northwest Illinois. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 2 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
